title: Lynda.com - Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Effects
description:
FCP6 is part of the Final Cut Studio suite of applications by Apple <a href="
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/</a>


Video Tutorial

Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Effects
with: Larry Jordan


In Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Effects, Apple Certified Trainer Larry Jordan examines the other half of Final Cut Pro: effects. Building on the foundation created in Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Editing, this training looks at how to use Final Cut to create a wide variety of professional-grade effects. Larry teaches all the fundamentals, including how to change clip speed, experiment with composite modes, use motion effects in a sophisticated way, and work with keyframes and filter effects. Larry demonstrates each effect and explains how and when to use it for best results. Exercise files accompany the tutorials.


Topics include:

Introduction
Changing clip speed
Working with text
Motion templates
Using video generators
Composite modes
Nesting
Using motion effects
Using motion effects with keyframes
Working with graphics and images
Using filter effects
Practical use of filters
Color correction
Rendering
Round-tripping between Final Cut Studio applications


For more info: <a href=" http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=428" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=428</a>

Hope you enjoy.
